> Take a look in these two packages for newbies in R...  

```{r packages, include=FALSE}
library(cowsay)
library(emo)
```

* [Cowsay package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cowsay/vignettes/cowsay_tutorial.html) - Speaking animals ``emo::ji("rodent")``
```{r cowsay, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
say("Hello world!", "cow")
say("Hello you!", "monkey")
```

* [Fortunes package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/fortunes/vignettes/fortunes.pdf) - Collected Wisdom in R ``emo::ji("smile")``
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(fortunes)
fortune(6)

fortune(68)

fortune(92)

fortune(192)

fortune(326)
```
